messages.title: NHS SPECIAL REPORT
messages.content: £8 billion a year extra for our NHS. Lib Dems only party with plan to fill NHS funding gap

messages.title: PROTECTING OUR NHS!
messages.content: Labour and Tories facing collapse: senior doctors' fear risk to the NHS from Tory, Labour plans

messages.title: OUTRAGE!
messages.content: TORY PLANS TO CUT NHS AND SCHOOLS CONDEMNED. The Conservatives have local services in their sights

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Liberal Democrats pledge to fund NHS in full as public service faces a £8 billion shortfall.
Ending mental health discrimination for good.
Lib Dems will balance the budget and protect local services such as education from excessive cuts.
Lib Dems to cut taxes by £1,200 for 30 million workers.

mentions.tacticalSituation: IT'S SO CLOSE HERE THIS TIME! LABOUR, UKIP ARMEDITIES AT THE READS UP IN CONSTITUENNY. YOU VOTE FOR LABOUR OR GREEN SQUANDERS VERONICA'S ANTO ESCAPE ROUTE.

issues.economy: ONLY LIB DEMS TO SPEND EXTRA £8BN ON NHS
issues.education: Lib Dems will balance the budget and protect local services such as education from excessive cuts.
issues.governance: The Liberal Democrats have pledged more money than any other party to ensure the NHS in England is free at the point of use. NHS funding protected.
issues.health: £8 billion a year extra for our NHS. Ending mental health discrimination for good. PROTECTING OUR NHS!

quotes.text: Voters back Lib Dems to stop £50bn cuts plan. Lib Dems will balance the books - but fairly.
ONLY LIB DEMS TO SPEND EXTRA £8BN ON NHS
People across the country are benefiting from the Lib Dems' record in Government
